title: [Gameplay] Bot Game Skins not showing
body:
I played an intermediate bot game, and it said I was playing a pool party leona dawn, but it showed her standard skin. Including in game. Not sure if the bug is the text or the skin, but either way figured it was worth reporting

[Pic Here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BwQngZ3zwHx7NEhwYnh2aE1ndTA/view?usp=sharing)

replies.body:
Hey Moonjuice7,

We're aware of issues where, especially in Team Builder, sometimes chromas won't load. Unfortunately, we don't have a solid repro for this one. :c I use the Nami chroma pack often, and I've found that swapping off the chroma pack and back onto it ensures the proper chroma pack will load. It's not an ideal fix, but it's something I've found while we continue to dive into the issue.
